mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOST (first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password, auth_status, membership_status) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{encryptedPassword}, #{authStatus}, #{membershipStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password,auth_status, membership_status, created_at, updated_at FROM HOST WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password,auth_status, membership_status, created_at, updated_at FROM HOST WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT id, first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password,auth_status, membership_status, created_at, updated_at FROM HOST WHERE email = #{email} AND encrypted_password = #{encryptedPassword}
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, nick_name, phone, email, encrypted_password,auth_status, membership_status, created_at, updated_at FROM HOST ORDER BY created_at DESC
